content.raw: Incidentally, I'd be very open to a feature that allows multiple `FreeGroup` instances to be merged into one, although that would complicate the implementation of the `FreeGroup` entity because the plugin would then have to keep track of which sets of `FreeGroup` instances have been requested by the user \(in the current implementation, the `FreeGroup` just borrows the entity ID of the link or model  that it’s constructed from\).
content.html: Incidentally, I'd be very open to a feature that allows multiple FreeGroup instances to be merged into one, although that would complicate the implementation of the FreeGroup entity because the plugin would then have to keep track of which sets of FreeGroup instances have been requested by the user (in the current implementation, the FreeGroup just borrows the entity ID of the link or model that it’s constructed from).
